short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you to easily add websites to your changedetection.io profile.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Changedetection.io website change detection browser extension, makes it SUPER easy to add new web pages to monitor for changes.

Simply connect it to your existing changedetection.io tool, then click "WATCH THIS WEB PAGE" to make your changedetection.io tool monitor that web page for changes.

Also features easy setting of "Restock Detection" mode when you just want to know if a product comes Back-In-Stock rather than any irrelevant content changes.
